00019 #ifndef _RTAI_BITS_H
00020 #define _RTAI_BITS_H
00021 
00022 #include <rtai_types.h>
00023 
00024 #define ALL_SET               0
00025 #define ANY_SET               1
00026 #define ALL_CLR               2
00027 #define ANY_CLR               3
00028 
00029 #define ALL_SET_AND_ANY_SET   4
00030 #define ALL_SET_AND_ALL_CLR   5
00031 #define ALL_SET_AND_ANY_CLR   6
00032 #define ANY_SET_AND_ALL_CLR   7
00033 #define ANY_SET_AND_ANY_CLR   8
00034 #define ALL_CLR_AND_ANY_CLR   9
00035 
00036 #define ALL_SET_OR_ANY_SET   10
00037 #define ALL_SET_OR_ALL_CLR   11
00038 #define ALL_SET_OR_ANY_CLR   12
00039 #define ANY_SET_OR_ALL_CLR   13
00040 #define ANY_SET_OR_ANY_CLR   14
00041 #define ALL_CLR_OR_ANY_CLR   15
00042 
00043 #define SET_BITS              0
00044 #define CLR_BITS              1
00045 #define SET_CLR_BITS          2
00046 #define NOP_BITS              3
00047 
00048 #define BITS_ERR     0xFfff  // same as semaphores
00049 #define BITS_TIMOUT  0xFffe  // same as semaphores
00050 
00051 struct rt_bits_struct;
00052 
00053 #ifdef __KERNEL__
00054 
00055 #ifdef CONFIG_RTAI_BITS_BUILTIN
00056 #define BITS_INIT_MODULE     bits_init_module
00057 #define BITS_CLEANUP_MODULE  bits_cleanup_module
00058 #else  /* !CONFIG_RTAI_BITS_BUILTIN */
00059 #define BITS_INIT_MODULE     init_module
00060 #define BITS_CLEANUP_MODULE  cleanup_module
00061 #endif /* CONFIG_RTAI_BITS_BUILTIN */
00062 
00063 #ifndef __cplusplus
00064 
00065 typedef struct rt_bits_struct {
00066 
00067     struct rt_queue queue;  /* <= Must be first in struct. */
00068     int magic;
00069     int type;  // to align mask to semaphore count, for easier uspace init
00070     unsigned long mask;
00071 
00072 } BITS;
00073 
00074 #else /* __cplusplus */
00075 extern "C" {
00076 #endif /* !__cplusplus */
00077 
00078 int BITS_INIT_MODULE(void);
00079 
00080 void BITS_CLEANUP_MODULE(void);
00081 
00082 void rt_bits_init(struct rt_bits_struct *bits,
00083                   unsigned long mask);
00084 
00085 int rt_bits_delete(struct rt_bits_struct *bits);
00086 
00087 unsigned long rt_get_bits(struct rt_bits_struct *bits);
00088 
00089 int rt_bits_reset(struct rt_bits_struct *bits,
00090                   unsigned long mask);
00091 
00092 unsigned long rt_bits_signal(struct rt_bits_struct *bits,
00093                              int setfun,
00094                              unsigned long masks);
00095 
00096 int rt_bits_wait(struct rt_bits_struct *bits,
00097                  int testfun,
00098                  unsigned long testmasks,
00099                  int exitfun,
00100                  unsigned long exitmasks,
00101                  unsigned long *resulting_mask);
00102 
00103 int rt_bits_wait_if(struct rt_bits_struct *bits,
00104                     int testfun,
00105                     unsigned long testmasks,
00106                     int exitfun,
00107                     unsigned long exitmasks,
00108                     unsigned long *resulting_mask);

00111                        int testfun,

00132 #include <rtai_lxrt.h>
00133 
00134 #define BITSIDX 0
00135 
00136 #ifdef __cplusplus
00137 extern "C" {
00138 #endif /* __cplusplus */
00139 
00140 RTAI_PROTO(struct rt_bits_struct *,rt_bits_init,(unsigned long name, unsigned long mask))
00141 {
00142         struct { unsigned long name, mask; } arg = { name, mask };
00143         return (struct rt_bits_struct *)rtai_lxrt(BITSIDX, SIZARG, BITS_INIT, &arg).v[LOW];
00144 }
00145 
00146 RTAI_PROTO(int, rt_bits_delete,(struct rt_bits_struct *bits))
00147 {
00148         struct { struct rt_bits_struct *bits; } arg = { bits };
00149         return rtai_lxrt(BITSIDX, SIZARG, BITS_DELETE, &arg).i[LOW];
00150 }
00151 
00152 RTAI_PROTO(unsigned long, rt_get_bits,(struct rt_bits_struct *bits))
00153 {
00154         struct { struct rt_bits_struct *bits; } arg = { bits };
00155         return rtai_lxrt(BITSIDX, SIZARG, BITS_GET, &arg).i[LOW];
00156 }
00157 
00158 RTAI_PROTO(int, rt_bits_reset,(struct rt_bits_struct *bits, unsigned long mask))
00159 {
00160         struct { struct rt_bits_struct *bits; unsigned long mask; } arg = { bits, mask };
00161         return rtai_lxrt(BITSIDX, SIZARG, BITS_RESET, &arg).i[LOW];
00162 }
00163 
00164 RTAI_PROTO(unsigned long, rt_bits_signal,(struct rt_bits_struct *bits, int setfun, unsigned long masks))
00165 {
00166         struct { struct rt_bits_struct *bits; int setfun; unsigned long masks; } arg = { bits, setfun, masks };
00167         return rtai_lxrt(BITSIDX, SIZARG, BITS_SIGNAL, &arg).i[LOW];
00168 }
00169 
00170 RTAI_PROTO(int, rt_bits_wait,(struct rt_bits_struct *bits, int testfun, unsigned long testmasks, int exitfun,
00171                               unsigned long exitmasks, unsigned long *resulting_mask))
00172 {
00173         struct { struct rt_bits_struct *bits; int testfun; unsigned long testmasks; int exitfun;
00174             unsigned long exitmasks; unsigned long *resulting_mask; } arg =
00175                 { bits, testfun, testmasks, exitfun, exitmasks, resulting_mask };
00176         return rtai_lxrt(BITSIDX, SIZARG, BITS_WAIT, &arg).i[LOW];
00177 }
00178 
00179 RTAI_PROTO(int, rt_bits_wait_if,(struct rt_bits_struct *bits, int testfun, unsigned long testmasks, int exitfun,
00180                                  unsigned long exitmasks, unsigned long *resulting_mask))
00181 {
00182         struct { struct rt_bits_struct *bits; int testfun; unsigned long testmasks; int exitfun;
00183             unsigned long exitmasks; unsigned long *resulting_mask; } arg =
00184                 { bits, testfun, testmasks, exitfun, exitmasks, resulting_mask };
00185         return rtai_lxrt(BITSIDX, SIZARG, BITS_WAIT_IF, &arg).i[LOW];
00186 }
00187 
00188 RTAI_PROTO(int, rt_bits_wait_until,(struct rt_bits_struct *bits, int testfun, unsigned long testmasks, int exitfun,
00189                                     unsigned long exitmasks, RTIME time, unsigned long *resulting_mask))
00190 {
00191         struct { struct rt_bits_struct *bits; int testfun; unsigned long testmasks; int exitfun;
00192             unsigned long exitmasks; RTIME time; unsigned long *resulting_mask; } arg =
00193                 { bits, testfun, testmasks, exitfun, exitmasks, time, resulting_mask };
00194         return rtai_lxrt(BITSIDX, SIZARG, BITS_WAIT_UNTIL, &arg).i[LOW];
00195 }
00196 
00197 RTAI_PROTO(int, rt_bits_wait_timed,(struct rt_bits_struct *bits, int testfun, unsigned long testmasks, int exitfun,
00198                                     unsigned long exitmasks, RTIME delay, unsigned long *resulting_mask))
00199 {
00200         struct { struct rt_bits_struct *bits; int testfun; unsigned long testmasks; int exitfun;
00201             unsigned long exitmasks; RTIME delay; unsigned long *resulting_mask; } arg =
00202                 { bits, testfun, testmasks, exitfun, exitmasks, delay, resulting_mask };
00203         return rtai_lxrt(BITSIDX, SIZARG, BITS_WAIT_TIMED, &arg).i[LOW];
00204 }

00206 #ifdef __cplusplus
00207 }

00210 #endif /* __KERNEL__ */
